verses.name: Job 12:2
verses.text: No doubt but ye are the people, and wisdom shall die with you.

verses.name: Job 12:3
verses.text: But I have understanding as well as you; I am not inferior to you: yea, who knoweth not such things as these?

verses.name: Job 12:4
verses.text: I am as one mocked of his neighbour, who calleth upon God, and he answereth him: the just upright man is laughed to scorn.

verses.name: Job 12:5
verses.text: He that is ready to slip with his feet is as a lamp despised in the thought of him that is at ease.
